name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Electronic Engineering and Signal Processing
content: Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers will be published in IOP Conference Series: Journal of Physics: Conference Series (Online ISSN: 1742-6596; Print ISSN: 1742-6588), which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus and some major databases for abstracting and indexing.
